mapper.select: SELECT psa.id psa_id, psav.id psav_id, psa.*, psav.*, if(pssav.sku_id, 1, 0) as 'isChecked' FROM pms_product_sale_attr psa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value psav ON psa.product_id = psav.product_id and psa.sale_attr_id = psav.sale_attr_id AND psa.product_id = #{param1} LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value pssav ON sku_id = #{param2} and psa.sale_attr_id = pssav.sale_attr_id and psav.id = pssav.sale_attr_value_id
